Reading List

“My alma mater was books, a good library… I could spend the rest of my life reading, just satisfying my curiosity” – Malcolm X

 

Currently reading

  • Brunelleschi’s Dome, by Ross King

  • 三體, 劉慈欣 者

2017

  14. The Checklist Manifesto, by Atul Gawande
  15. The Martian, by Andy Weir
  16. The Prophet, by Kahlil Gibran
  17. The Right Stuff, by Tom Wolfe
  18. The True Believer, by Eric Hoffer
  19. The Ultimate Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy, by Douglas Adams
  20. The Undoing Project, by Michael Lewis

  23. 塞外奇俠傳, 梁羽生 者
